japanese: この本はその本より古い。
english: This book is older than that one.

japanese: 私はクラスで一番若い。
english: I am the youngest in my class.

japanese: 私の犬はあなたの犬と同じくらい大きい。
english: My dog is as big as yours.

japanese: この夏は去年より暑い。
english: This summer is hotter than last year.

japanese: 富士山は日本で一番高い山です。
english: Mt. Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan.

japanese: 彼は私と同じくらい速く走ります。
english: He runs as fast as I.

japanese: トムはケンより速く走ります。
今日は昨日ほど寒くない。
english: Today is not as cold as yesterday.

japanese: 彼女は家族の中で一番背が高い。
english: She is the tallest in her family.
